name: Crossy Crash
description:
Grab this unique new exciting addition to the Traffic Panic series for FREE!

Tap the lights to keep the traffic flowing across the busy road, avoid mega crashes and see how many levels you can get through in this totally addictive, pixel-art game!

There are lots of interesting and beautiful environments to play in, from the dense forests to fiery volcanic lands.

You have control of the lights at a busy intersection. Time the light changes perfectly to allow your traffic to speed through! Be careful not to keep the light's green for too long or there could be a big crash!

Crossy Crash is the exciting free game you'll want to tell your friends about. Which level can they get to?!

FEATURES
- Beautiful Environments
- Smooth and satisfying gameplay
- High-speed action
- Cool vehicles
- Free to play
- Bright, vibrant and colourful
- Simple and satisfying
- Beautiful pixel-art style
